hotels.name: Hotel las Palmas
hotels.description_1: Hotel Las Palmas features an outdoor pool and a health club. Dining options at the hotel include a restaurant and a coffee shop/caf√©. A bar/lounge is on site where guests can unwind with a drink.
hotels.description_2: A complimentary breakfast is offered each morning. A computer station is located on site and wired and wireless Internet access is complimentary.

topReviews.text: This is one of the best hotels in Portugal. You should definitively try it!
Being at this hotel has been one of the best experiences of my life. Super recommended!

hotels.name: Crowne Plaza Maruma
hotels.description_1: The 5-star Crowne Plaza Maruma offers well-equipped rooms with 32-inch TVs and panoramic views of the city. The Crowne Plaza Maruma features tennis courts, gym, sauna, whirlpool, outdoor pool and body treatments.
hotels.description_2: In addition to a rich breakfast buffet, the restaurant serves international and Venezuelan food. There is also a bar available in the hotel, as well as room service 24 hours.

topReviews.text: If you ever come to Maracaibo Venezuela, this is definitively the hotel for you, it has everything you need and the pool is amazing.
I had one of the best experiences ever in this hotel, one of the best of the city.
